definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: wheel of chariot ([[מֶרְכָּבָה]]) Ex 14:25, 1Ki 7:33, Na 3:2; of (threshing) cart ([[עֲגָלָה]]) Is 28:27 cf. Pr 20:26 (as instr. of punishment).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: wheels in Ezek.'s vision Ez Eze 1:15, Eze 1:16, Eze 1:16, Eze 1:19, Eze 1:19, Eze 1:20, Eze 1:20, Eze 1:21 (del. Co) Eze 1:21, Eze 3:13, Eze 10:6, Eze 10:9, Eze 10:9, Eze 10:9, Eze 10:10, Eze 10:10, Eze 10:12, Eze 10:12, Eze 10:12, Eze 10:13, Eze 10:16, Eze 10:16, Eze 10:19, Eze 11:22.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: wheels of the ten bases beneath the lavers in Sol.'s temple 1Ki 7:30, 1Ki 7:32, 1Ki 7:32, 1Ki 7:32, 1Ki 7:33.
